availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Archibald E. Holland (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John Holland. Married to Caroline Cash Holland in Stewart County, Tennessee, on November 28, 1859. Father of Mary F. Holland and William Holland. Farmer in Princeton, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 50.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 464A.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, Enumeration District 158, p. 431D.
"An Act to change the name of William Johnston, and others," Acts of the General Assembly of the Commonwealth of Kentucky (Frankfort, Ky.: A. G. Hodges & Co., State Printer, 1849), 62.
Tennessee State Marriages, 1780-2002, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN, Stewart County Marriage Records, 1849-1893.
"Archibald E. Holland Sr. (1838-1885)," Find A Grave, Memorial 160845273, accessed September 14, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/160845273.
